competence: Adapt to new technologies and methods

cak.workExperienceSummary: My responsibilities included ensuring that the new APIs were automatedly tested in Robot Framework, primarily focusing on API testing and some frontend testing. I performed the following tests: integration testing on the testing environment, chain testing on the acceptance environment, and assisting with acceptance testing on the production environment. Additionally, I worked on improving the CI/CD process for testing and troubleshooting test agent (server) issues across CAK.

courses: PCEP™ Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer - Python Institute (2023)
